info.name: Youtube Darker theme than stock (Complement)
info.description:
This is a complement for the stock Youtube black theme, this will convert the black youtube theme into a darker theme.

PD: You must have enabled the stock youtube black theme, this is just a complement to make it darker
info.additionalInfo:
14/05/2019 - Youtube premium logo included
23/04/2019 - Fixed subscribed text color
26/01/2019 - Subscribe button is red again
25/01/2019 - Scroll bars are now hidden for better full screen videos experience
16/01/2019 - Fixed like and dislike colors when one of them is pressed
14/01/2019 - Little issue fixed !
30/07/2018 - Replaced dark grey background to REAL Black background
17/05/2018 - Improved

data.title: Great theme, looks great and no issues.
Great theme, looks great and no issues.
Hi there guys, thank you for your download and feedback.  reported issues are fixed
I made some edits that fixed some grey areas to full black. (Just add it on another section)
